DOC.detailed_description: Introduction ESWL ( extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy ) revolutionize treatment urolithiasis due noninvasive nature , cost effectiveness , reduce hospitalization time less morbidity1 , 2.Impact shock wave cause pain patient require analgesia sedation . It important make patient pain free get maximum possible stone free rates3 , 4 . Opioids use commonly pain relief ESWL side effect require patient monitoring delay hospital stay3 , 4 . NSAIDS also show promising result regard pain control ESWL without side effect opoids1 , 5 . Local analgesia gel controversial role relieve pain ESWL 1 , 6 . There yet guideline pain relief ESWL1 , 4 . We intend compare effect local analgesia gel , oral NSAIDS combination pain lithotripsy .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 70 year Having renal stone Meet criterion ESWL H/o chronic use analgesia , 2 ) Allergy use medication , 3 ) ureteric stone , 4 ) Serum creatinine > 1.4 , 5 ) Pregnant patient , 6 ) gastric ulcer disease , 7 ) willing participate , 8 ) Have coagulopathy 9 ) active urinarytract infection .
